description.title: RPC API: check get_code
description.purpose: Deploy a contract and when deployed check that you can call getCode to return the byte code. Note that the resulting bytecode does NOT match with the bytecode that is stored on the blockchain. The reason for that is that the compiled contract contains an initialization part that is run only once when the contract is submitted to the chain. So the byte code stored on the blockchain is the code without the initialization part.
